page.title: 17THE COMMUNITY POLICEMAN.
page.content: P.C.Stubbs, our local community policeman,is one of six community policemen who work in Bolton.Each has his own beat which is about 1km wide and 2km long.Each beat is around the town centre stretching out into those areas where many people live.Each community policeman walks his beat getting to know the people who live there so that they will trust him as a friend.Policemen work eight hour shifts;usually the hours are 7am-3pm,3pm-11pm and 11pm-7am. The community policeman does not usually work a night shift and can alter his shift to suit what is happening in his area.When the community policeman is off duty, his beat is covered by officers in a patrol car. The community policeman is always in radio contact with the police station and can ask for assistance if he needs it.
